snippet: Santonio Holmes of the Jets appeared to quit on his team on Sunday. Do other examples of quitting come to mind? And what do you think the repercussions should be?
abstract: Santonio Holmes of the Jets appeared to quit on his team on Sunday. Do other examples of quitting come to mind? And what do you think the repercussions should be?

headline.main: From Pippen to Holmes: Is There a Penalty for Quitting on a Team?
